item.title: Boeing faces fresh safety questions after engine fire on flight from Scotland
item.description:
Passengers saw flames soon after flight left Edinburgh for New York in 2023, leading to emergency landing in Glasgow

Boeing faces fresh questions about the safety of its aircraft after an engine fire on a transatlantic flight from Edinburgh caused an emergency landing soon after takeoff.

Flames were seen by passengers briefly shooting from the engine of a Delta Air Lines 767 soon after it took off for New York in February last year, after a turbine blade broke off during take-off.

Continue reading...

Amazon's Echo deals have dried up after Prime Day
item.description: The best Prime Day Echo deals included the Echo Spot's first discount and a 71% discount on the Echo Buds with Active Noise Cancellation. They've since disappeared.

item.title: It's your last chance to snag these great Prime Day TV deals
item.description: The best Prime Day TV deals at Amazon include a 65-inch TCL QLED under $400 and a new record low on the LG G3 OLED.

item.title: Prime Day laptop deals that are still live: Some record lows on MacBooks and LG grams are holding strong
item.description: We're keeping track of the best Prime Day laptop deals that are still live, which mostly revolve around Apple MacBooks, LG grams, and gaming laptops from Acer and Asus.
